attributes.action: Bring back death penalty for child murderers and child sex offenders
attributes.background:
Death penalty for people who kill children 
Death penalty for people who abuse children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
